docs.snippet: MONTGOMERY, Ala., Jan. 4--Gov. George C. Wallace of Alabama and his wife, Cornelia, were divorced today on their seventh wedding anniversary after a surprise settlement of their long-pending divorce suit....
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTGOMERY, Ala., Jan. 4--Gov. George C. Wallace of Alabama and his wife, Cornelia, were divorced today on their seventh wedding anniversary after a surprise settlement of their long-pending divorce suit.
docs.abstract: Wallace is divorced on 7th wedding anniv after surprise settlement; under settlement, reached only hrs before case was to go to trial, Mrs Wallace will receive $75,000 in lump-sum alimony plus small cabin in lake resort area not far from Montgomery; she will also take a few personal items; at 1 point in pretrial proceedings, Gov Wallace estimated his personal wealth at slightly more than $200,000 (M)

headline.main: Wallaces Divorced After 7 Years; Suit Settled Before Trial Starts; 'Everything Is Used' Wife Present at Shooting

docs.snippet: Tchaikovsky's rarely heard "Joan of Arc," which was to have been produced by the Opera Company of Boston next spring, will be postponed a year. Shirley Verrett, cast for the title role, has been delayed by illness in the learning of new roles she ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tchaikovsky's rarely heard "Joan of Arc," which was to have been produced by the Opera Company of Boston next spring, will be postponed a year. Shirley Verrett, cast for the title role, has been delayed by illness in the learning of new roles she is undertaking, and decided to defer her first appearance as Joan of Arc.
docs.abstract: Joan of Arc (Opera): Tchaikovsky's rarely heard 'Joan of Arc,' which was to have been produced by Opera Co of Boston in spring, will be postponed 1 yr; Shirley Verrett, cast for title role, has been delayed by illness in learning of new roles she is undertaking and decided to defer her 1st appearance as Joan of Arc (S)
